articles.title: Comics roast Conan O’Brien, torch Trump at Kennedy Center’s Twain Prize - The Washington Post
articles.description: Some of America’s top comedians praised the famously apolitical late-night host — and had some choice words for the Kennedy Center’s new chairman.
